mapper.select: select bu.userid userId,bu.login_name loginName,bu.status from base_user bu where bu.login_name=#{loginName} and bu.password=#{password}
select count(1) from base_user bu where bu.login_name=#{_name}
mapper.update: update base_user bu set bu.`password`= #{passWord} where bu.login_name=#{loginName}
mapper.select: SELECT bu.userid AS userId, bu.login_name AS userName, bu.email AS email, bu.`name`, bu.phone, bu.age, bu.photo FROM base_user bu WHERE bu.userid =#{userId} and bu.`status`=1

SELECT bu.userid userId, bu.login_name loginName, bu.display_name displayName, bu.phone, bu.email, bu.industry, bu.age, bu.`name`, ( CASE WHEN ah.auth_state IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE ah.auth_state END ) authState FROM base_user bu LEFT JOIN authentification ah ON bu.userid = ah.user_id where bu.userid=#{userId} ORDER BY bu.userid ASC
mapper.sql:
SELECT bu.userid userId, bu.login_name loginName, bu.user_describe userDescribe, DATE_FORMAT(bu.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, bu.phone, bu.email FROM base_user bu where bu.user_parent=#{parentId}
and bu.login_name like CONCAT('%', #{loginName},'%')
mapper.delete: DELETE base_user, user_group_relation FROM base_user LEFT JOIN user_group_relation ON base_user.userid=user_group_relation.user_id where base_user.userid=#{subUserId} and base_user.user_parent=#{parentUserId}
